abstract: Tanganyika Oil has announced it will be acquired by Sinopec International Petroleum Exploration and Production for 2 billion Canadian dollars ($1.9 billion).
lead_paragraph: Tanganyika Oil has announced it will be acquired by Sinopec International Petroleum Exploration and Production for 2 billion Canadian dollars ($1.9 billion).

headline.main: Tanganyika Oil to Sinopec for C$2 Billion
